pr_title: Consider currentDockerImage/wantedDockerImage if container is empty

timeline.message: Consider currentDockerImage/wantedDockerImage if container is empty

timeline.bodyText: Consider returning <none> instead of wanted, as the latter might be misleading.
timeline.author: mpolden

replies.bodyText: FWIW, current is potentially equally misleading. If we are upgrading Vespa and the container crashes on startup with the new version, current will still be the old version.
replies.author: freva

timeline.message: Use <none> if no current docker image
